resources.string: Born on a strange planet named \"Earth\", the Human is a very versatile and well rounded race. Capable of soloing and being a team player, the Human is recommended for new players.
Elves are known across realms as being the most beautiful creatures in the universe. Elves have higher dexterity however have lower strength from the trait of flight rather than fight.

Dwarf\'s are not as beautiful as the Elf, therefore start with lower charisma, intelligence and wisdom. Spending a lifetime living in mountains and caves, the Dwarf is known to have super-human strength and can take a million and one attacks from a foe.

The Hobbit is a small creature that like to stay low to the ground and are known to have a strange affinity with rings. Hobbits have cat like reflexes and golem like stamina therefore start with more reflex and constitution however starting with lower strength.
This app is a wiki app for the Last Quest MMORPG made by RPG Inc. Please select an option from the menu to navigate through
